description:
Tecno Spark 6 Go Price & Release Date in Bangladesh

Tecno Spark 6 Go Full Specs October, 2024

Tecno Spark 6 Go is a budget smartphone featuring a big display and quality camera setup. Further, the decent RAM and pretty big storage space offered by the device surely turn it into a comprehensive deal. Budget smartphone with impressive specs

Display and Camera

Spark 6 Go offers a 6.52-inch HD+ IPS LCD display having a pixel density of 283 PPI. The screen resolution of the mobile is 720 x 1600 pixels and features a bezel-less waterdrop notch display on the front, housing the selfie shooter.

The smartphone offers a decent camera experience as per its budget. It presents a dual camera set up with a 13MP Primary Camera and a 2MP Depth Camera. Some of the features offered by the rear cameras are Exposure compensation, Auto Flash, ISO control, HDR mode, Face Detection, Digital Zoom, and Touch to focus. In the front there is a single 8MP Selfie Lens.

Configuration and Batter

Tecno Spark 6 Go runs on MediaTek Helio A20 chipset, powered by a Quad-core Cortex A53 processor, running at a clock speed of 2GHz. It also features an impressive 2/3/4GB RAM and PowerVR GE8300 GPU, offering a descent gaming and multi-tasking experience. The mobile derives its energy from a powerful 5000mAh, non-replaceable Li-ion battery.

Storage and Connectivity

6 Go has an internal storage of 32/64GB which can be expanded up to 256 GB as per users’ needs. They also get a wide variety of connectivity options like 4G VoLTE support, Bluetooth, Mobile Hotspot, A-GPS, and micro-USB 2.0.
